
## Cognito Auth Flow

1. POST  https://cognito-idp.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/

```json
{
    "AuthFlow": "USER_SRP_AUTH",
    "ClientId": "3obd6pn17cm5oh20ir8kreqa7d",
    "AuthParameters": {
        "USERNAME": "admin",
        "SRP_A": ""
    },
    "ClientMetadata": {}
}

```

Response

```json

{
    "ChallengeName": "PASSWORD_VERIFIER",
    "ChallengeParameters": {
        "SALT": "1e18506105f67c1a2c3c19f3ff67ec5d",
        "SECRET_BLOCK": "",
        "SRP_B": "",
        "USERNAME": "admin",
        "USER_ID_FOR_SRP": "admin"
    }
}

```


2. POST  https://cognito-idp.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/

```json
{
    "ChallengeName": "PASSWORD_VERIFIER",
    "ClientId": "3obd6pn17cm5oh20ir8kreqa7d",
    "ChallengeResponses": {
        "USERNAME": "admin",
        "PASSWORD_CLAIM_SECRET_BLOCK": "",
        "TIMESTAMP": "Wed Jun 15 01:58:46 UTC 2022",
        "PASSWORD_CLAIM_SIGNATURE": "Gcw7cuFE/nm7LhtmsjQ091tO7durA/Z5VpGklinJKxU="
    },
    "ClientMetadata": {}
}

```

Response

```json
{
    "AuthenticationResult": {
```

3. POST  https://cognito-idp.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/

```json
{
    "AccessToken": "eyJraWQiOiJ4VVNjSVlSdE5WbDVZeVNKS3pCZ3I5TWJ5RDF6ZHpjQndITDFydDl2RmFRPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..g25wMrU-kvW_G7VVSAd4CV70uuXxW209uD55twQlljAwxPgPppaxEBd_xOHmhRZTXjlYeqs6kPR7qPq1W7-ZbX6Zi4g95htfTl0goTDreTjGVjbuwdPkGyk2JQXcixAb2d7w9arxzAi1NXVTxR4CWcwPKDADpuiJC0P9OGGpYJ_G48rTXejJVVrOJgijvjRo1_VpM568b5ebyFbqrt245nWJzlJs-8LHjRGaCj_COVbiirfizu3ls44qyfRf5fuRfRedj4lOTz1n3N_PTuwwcMrkeh3KIzFpsQhJpvl_bujjJQnPg-LaKIDvuo7ryhVxX-R1IBKsw66Cvks0MAXcwQ"
}
```

Response
```json
{
    "UserAttributes": [{
        "Name": "sub",
        "Value": "ef52c4ed-7e36-4032-be66-4c3fb5ba5eae"
    }, {
        "Name": "custom:identity_pool",
        "Value": "us-east-1:5e424d79-df12-4351-8f83-52f2922358c4"
    }, {
        "Name": "email_verified",
        "Value": "true"
    }, {
        "Name": "email",
        "Value": "yonmzn@amazon.com"
    }],
    "Username": "admin"
}
```


4. GET https://6jdi54xl6a.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/v1/settings/


## Authing

1. GET https://authing-test-liuyong.authing.cn/oidc/auth?nonce=008384778829504391&state=6776512299882096&scope=openid+email+profile+address+phone+order:read&client_id=62a8392bb610e1da3f7aeefb&redirect_uri=http://localhost:4000/callback&response_type=code&code_challenge=oIZCxVAwQ01VcguU4Aj382LHvAKDMHt6EKXPzSnwepI&code_challenge_method=S256

```
nonce: 008384778829504391
state: 6776512299882096
scope: openid email profile address phone order:read
client_id: 62a8392bb610e1da3f7aeefb
redirect_uri: http://localhost:4000/callback
response_type: code
code_challenge: oIZCxVAwQ01VcguU4Aj382LHvAKDMHt6EKXPzSnwepI
code_challenge_method: S256
```

```

```

## Auth0

1. 2. ## Permissions

### auth0
